summary: I’ll always catch you when you fall
title: I’ll always catch you when you fall
body:
Pairing: Peter Parker x Stark!Reader
Words: 1247
Warnings: Death, angst, fluff
A/N: I wrote this as @wishingforahome‘s prize in the Lost Easter Egg game(still 2 spots left!) I hope you like what I did with it. The prompt was Peter’s first mission back with the team after the dusting goes a bit rough and reader cheers him up

Growing up as the daughter of the infamous Tony Stark meant that I never had a lot of friends. So when everyone came back after the whole Dusting situation and Dad invited Peter and Aunt May to come to live at the Avengers Tower, well let’s just say that I was pretty much over the moon to have another teenager around to talk to.

Thanos had been dead for just over a month and I could see everyone still reeling with the aftershock of undoing all the problems the oversized purple grape had caused. Hell, some days even I couldn’t get out of bed, let alone try to save the world, again.

It was a warm and sunny Saturday morning, Peter and I had decided to head over to the compound to make use of the ginormous swimming pool and home theatre that had been installed when the compound was first built. We had planned an entire day for just the two of us. But those plans quickly flew out the window when alarms went off as soon as we set foot in the common room.

Before we could ask Friday what was going on Dad came rushing in, making a beeline for the two of us. “Time to suit up kid, we just got word of an alien hostage situation in Brazil, and we need you with us. Wheels up in twenty,” he says to Peter before hurrying away, probably to his lab. Peter looks at me with wide eyes, this would be his first mission since being back and I could see just a hint of fear in his warm brown eyes. I take his hands into my own, keeping my voice as calm and steady as possible. “Everything’s gonna be fine Pete, you’re gonna do great, I believe in you, babe.” I wrap my arms around his waist in a soft hug and kiss his cheek.

Fifteen minutes later I’m standing in the hangar as I watch the team prepare to leave. Dad and Peter walk in together, conversing in low voices, probably already thinking of new upgrades to the suits and weapons. Dad steps over to me first, giving me a tight hug. “Take care of him,” I whisper in his ear. He gives me a quick nod and a “take care kiddo,” before boarding the jet, leaving me and Peter alone. He wraps his arms around me in a tight bear hug, dropping a kiss on top of my head. “Take care of him, and I love you,” I whisper in his ear, squeezing my eyes shut to keep the tears from falling. “I love you too, and I will” he whispers before boarding the jet just in time for takeoff.

The team was gone for most of the day, so I busied myself with baking every and anything I could think of while catching up on episodes of Once Upon A Time on Netflix. It was mid-afternoon when Friday announced that the jet was five minutes out. I raced down to the hangar, reaching it just as the jet touched down and the back door opened. As everyone filed out I could see they were all a little battered and bruised, with a few scrapes here and there, but it was the look in their eyes that told me what I needed to know; it was rough. The last to exit was Peter, his face almost blank if not for the red-rimmed look in his eyes.

As I reached out to touch him, he flinched away and my heart sank. I watched him walk out the door, ignoring the worried look the others gave him as he passed. “This one didn’t go so well; something happened but he refuses to talk. Maybe give him some time to himself before you talk to him,” Bucky says quietly beside me, I hadn’t even noticed him approach. I nod slowly before making my way to my room, I didn’t want the others to see my heart breaking because I couldn’t help my own boyfriend.

I must have fallen asleep because when I wake the sun had set, bathing my room in a pretty lavender. “Sorry, I didn’t mean to wake you,” I recognize Wanda’s voice by the door as I slowly sit up and get my bearings. “No, it’s okay Wanda, come in. What’s wrong?” She flashes a brief smile as she crosses the room to sit by my side. “It’s Peter, I know why he locked himself in his room. On the mission, there was this girl who looked very much like you, and she got hit by some shrapnel, we couldn’t save her, and she died in his arms. The others don’t know this, I wouldn’t have known either except his thoughts are so loud right now, I couldn’t shut him out. He’s hurting, y/n, blaming himself for what something that is not his fault. Maybe it would be best if you go talk to him,” her voice is soft and tinged with worry.

I lay a comforting hand on her arm and give her a soft smile. “Thank you, sestra, I’ll talk to him. In the meantime though, please keep this between us?” “Of course,” she nods before leaving. I take a few deep breaths before standing up and going to gather supplies.

Armed with snacks, drinks, and some of the treats I had made earlier, I make my way to Peter’s door. Knowing he probably wouldn’t let me in, I call out, “Friday, please open the door.” With a click, the door opens to reveal a completely dark room. By knowing his room as well as my own, I walk over to his desk and switch on the light, putting down everything in my arms before walking over to his bed.

Peter is curled up on his side with his back facing me. I sit down on the edge of the bed and gently run my hand through his soft curls. After a while, he slowly relaxes and turns to face me. “I’m here sweetheart, I’m not going anywhere. You don’t have to tell me what happened, I just want you to know that I’m here for you, no matter what. So how about we forget about everything for a while and just be Peter and Y/N?” He gives me a watery smile and a nod. We move all the food to the bed and Peter grabs a blanket for us to cuddle under as I have Friday queue up the Lord of the Rings trilogy on Netflix.

Soon we’re both quoting the lines to each other, laughing at the jokes, and at each other as we each try to distract the other with tickles and soft, lazy kisses. As we’re waiting for Return of the King to load, Peter turns to me with a serious expression. “Y/N? Thank you. For everything. I honestly don’t know what I’d do without you angel.” “There’s nothing to thank me for, I’ll always be there to catch you when you fall, just like I know you’d do for me,” I kiss him softly before snuggling back into his arms, “Now hush, I wanna watch Smeagol murder Deagol.” At this he lets out a loud laugh, burying his face in my hair. “You’re so weird, but that’s okay because you’re my weirdo,” he says before planting a quick peck on my head then snuggling down into the bed for the rest of the movie.

Tags:

@mcdesij
@spiderrrling
@arrow-guy
@interestedbystanderwrites
@caplansteverogers
@gwendelerynan
@lukebalehiddleston
@here2have-fun
@bvckys-doll
@bookscoffeeandracoons
@bambamwolf87
@loricameback
@rockrchick51
@love-nakamura
@moisoverennyi-thestarlessone
@wishingforahome
@timelordy-fangirl2
@jewelofwinter

A/N: I wrote this as @wishingforahome‘s prize in the Lost Easter Egg game(still 2 spots left!) I hope you like what I did with it. The prompt was Peter’s first mission back with the team after the dusting goes a bit rough and reader cheers him up

summary: Which Cinematic Universe Should You Live In?
title: Which Cinematic Universe Should You Live In?
excerpt: Will it be in a very distant galaxy, in Middle Earth or in a magical world?

summary: I’ve reached 2K subs on Youtube! Thank you to everyone who’s supported my channel! I love you all so much and I hope you all...
caption:
I’ve reached 2K subs on Youtube! Thank you to everyone who’s supported my channel! I love you all so much and I hope you all like this little collab edit I made.

I also want to thank Eveline221, darknessandlight97 and xTHEx xUNTITLEDx for collabing with me. Make sure to check out their channel!

trail.content_raw:
I’ve reached 2K subs on Youtube! Thank you to everyone who’s supported my channel! I love you all so much and I hope you all like this little collab edit I made.

I also want to thank Eveline221, darknessandlight97 and xTHEx xUNTITLEDx for collabing with me. Make sure to check out their channel!

blog.name: justauthoring
blog.title: just authoring
blog.description:
[Requests are OPEN for ST characters!]

All My Master-Lists

Fandom's List

Request Rules

title: in the future // peter parker
body:
Request: hello there! I saw that you are taking request for Peter Parker and I was wondering if you could write something along the lines of the reader being a little bit drunk and really funny and Peter’s like “I’m gonna marry that girl someday”? just a fluff thing because we all need a little fluff now and then, thank you very much :)

Please don’t plagiarize my work!

Word Count: 739

With his arm securely wrapped around your waist, Peter holds you tightly against himself, struggling to keep you upright all while trying to open the door to his bedroom. He was trying to be as quiet as possible, in the hopes of not waking up your parents – he knew you’d never hear the end of it if they saw how drunk you were.

Peter winces at the loud giggle that bursts from your lips, his shoulders tensing in response. With haste, he pushes open his door, softly but quickly shutting it behind him as you stumble your way out of his arms, leaning against your wall for support as you continue to giggle madly.

“Shh,” Peter urges, pressing his pointer finger against his lips as he meets your eyes. “We don’t want to wake your parents, Y/N.”

You reluctantly quiet, your lips curving into a frown as you furrow your brows up at Peter. “Why not?” You slur, pushing off the wall and crossing the room over to your dresser. Peter watches your movements carefully.

“You’re drunk,” Peter sighs, but even then, he can’t help the small smile on his lips as he watches you with amusement. “If your parents see you like this, they’ll kill you.”

“Oh,” you mumble, your eyes widening a fraction in realization. You turn your head over your shoulder, nodding at Peter while pressing your pointer finger against your lips, mimicking Peter’s earlier actions. Peter smiles brightly at that, but the grin soon fades from his lips when you suddenly grab the hem of your blouse, pulling it up and over your head.

Eyes widening, cheeks warming, Peter snaps his head the other way, placing one of his hands over his eyes mainly for your sake. He’s a little baffled, but he has to remind himself that you’re heavily intoxicated and not thinking clearly. “Y/N!”

Left in only your skirt and bra, you turn back towards Peter. “Wha?”

“Put a shirt on!”

“I am!” You hiss back, eyes narrowing in bewilderment. “Give me a minute!”

Peter sighs, shaking his head as he remains quiet for the next few seconds. He hear the slight ruffling of clothing, signalling that you are indeed changing. And then, a moment later, you call out for Peter’s name, signalling you were decent and Peter glances back your way, his entire body flooding with surprise once more.

You were clothed, true to your word, but all you had on was a shirt you’d stolen from Peter long ago. It wasn’t like this was the first time you’d ever worn something of his, but there was something different about it this time. Maybe it was because you were drunk, or that it was the middle of the night and the two of you were stood alone in his room. Maybe it was because you weren’t wearing any pants with the shirt. Peter didn’t know.

All he knew is that his cheeks were practically burning at the sight of you, and a tingling sensation flooded his entire body – you looked good in his clothing.

“Okay, uh,” coughing slightly, Peter makes his way over to you, carefully setting his hand on your waist and guiding you over to your bed. He makes sure not to let his hand stray any lower and higher, pulling back your sheets as you crawl in. “Let’s get you to bed.”

“I’m not tired though.”

Biting his lips, Peter smiles softly at the pout you give him. With a shake of his head, Peter pulls the bed sheets up to your chin. “You are,” he whispers, “trust me. And in the morning, you’ll thank me.”

“You’re staying?”

Peter blinks; “uh, no, I just meant–”

“Why not?”

“Because,” Peter sputters, glancing around himself nervously. “I, well, um…”

You raise your hand, grabbing Peter’s tightly and pulling him forward. “Stay,” you whisper, your alcohol scented breath fawning over the expansion of his face. Peter swallows nervously, nodding slowly.

You shift over, making room for Peter who carefully crawls in next to you. After becoming situated next to your side, Peter feels his entire body tense the moment you curl into his side, letting your head fall on his chest. After a moment of stunned silence, you mumble, eyelids heavy; “thank you, Peter.”

And as Peter feels your breathing even out, glancing down at your peaceful expression, he can’t help but think; i’m going to marry this girl someday.

-

Let me know what you thought? Remember, reblogging always helps!

This wasn’t as funny as i’d hope, more fluffy then anything and awkward. But nonetheless, I hope you enjoyed!

blog.name: justasimplefangirl2019
blog.title: A safe place (... kinda)
blog.description: She/her| reblogger, shipper, teenager, fandom-jumper, a person who talks about her problems here instead of talking about them irl, and someone who, while doesn't trust people, wants everyone to try and be good to others as long as they're not hurting others

title: I just realized something.
body:
The Spider-Man Raimi trilogy and the Dark Knight trilogy.

1. The 2nd installments are seen as “the best” of their respective trilogies by at least most of the fandoms.

2. A different love interest from the comics gets introduced in the 3rd movie (Gwen Stacy and Selina Kyle).

3. They both ended just a year before the respective movieverses of their original dimensions began (Spider-Man 3 - 2007, Iron Man - 2008. Dark Knight Rises - 2012, Man of Steel - 2013).

4. Speaking of their movieverses, both the MCU (officially Tom Holland) and the DCEU/Worlds of DC (Ben Affleck) versions of their characters arrived for the very first time in 2016 (CA:CW and BvS) and appeared in two already-premiered movies (”Spider-Man Homecoming” and “Avengers; Infinity War” for Spidey, “Suicide Squad” and “Justice League” for B-Man).

5. They are both considered the widest-known/best superheroes of their respective franchises, and the ones I began this with are often considered to be the best (at least live-action) versions of the characters.

blog.name: terrasu
blog.title: SN2006gy
blog.description:
Lucy/Aurora. 22. Lesbian.
Jewish. Fanfic writer. Creator.

Help me // others.

SN2006gy is the classification for a hypernova or quark-nova witnessed in 2006. It released 10^44 Joules of energy.

source: Tony Stark, seconds from passing out from exhaustion

blog.description: A blog about fanfic writing, including updates about my fanfics, possible discussions of the characters/shows they're from, raves about other people's fics, and probably some random things that remind me of my fics, or that I just find hilarious and think need to be shared :) If you're interested in checking out my stories, look for me on fanfiction.net, under the name Ink Outside the Lines.

tags: even more than what i've listed here
so many good team up possibilities
even when it doesn't make sense
summary: I will forever be salty about all the missed opportunities in the MCU thanks to their determination to keep the movies and tv...
body:
I will forever be salty about all the missed opportunities in the MCU thanks to their determination to keep the movies and tv shows so separate from each other.  I mean honestly.

Matt gets framed as a domestic terrorist in the beginning of DD and multiple buildings are blown up, and Marvel expects me to believe that Tony Stark would just completely ignore the threat of a terrorist in his own backyard???  Tony Freaking Stark??? Ignore a terrorist threat??? In his backyard???

And!!  There’s a bunch of news articles/stories about a bad guy that can control people’s minds!!  And Marvel REALLY THINKS that Natasha and Clint wouldn’t be ALL OVER THAT.  

And then there’s Vulture, just out there selling weaponized alien tech, and Marvel’s just gonna pretend that not even one (1) criminal from Hell’s Kitchen decided to buy them??  Huh??  Just gonna pretend that no criminal ever decided to try just straight up vaporizing Daredevil???  Gonna pretend that Matt didn’t start investigating where these alien weapons were coming from??  JUST PRETEND THAT SPIDER MAN AND DAREDEVIL NEVER MET EACH OTHER???

Marvel expects me to believe that Hydra and the Hand haven’t worked together in the past, hmm??  That the Howling Commandos never ran into evil ninjas??  Or that Peggy Carter never had a brush with them during her career???  REALLY?

title: Top 5 Marvel Villains
body:
Top 5 Marvel Villains

  1. Thanos- Thanos is a villain who was 10 years in the making throughout the MCU appearing in post credit scenes after the two Avengers movies, appearing for a brief period in Guardians of the Galaxy but he is also the one pulling the strings behind a few other of my favourite villains throughout the series.
  2. Killmonger- This is one Marvel villain who actually kind of wins the moral argument in the…
